name: Don't Rage
description:
👉 Succeed in a parkour filled with obstacles!
The level is very difficult! So don't lose hope... 😡



👉 Be careful, there is no checkpoint!
This means that if you fall, you have to start again! You will waste time!



👉 Complete the parkours as quickly as possible and start over as few as possible!
👉 A death counter and a timer is available!

🤔 SO ? who will finish as soon as possible❓



Updates will be regular. Here is the program :

👉 Every month = A new "Rage pass".
👉 Every 2 months = A very big update.

👉 Between the weeks, there will be small updates.
